title: Incase of reserved sites which are under acquisition, the repairs may be allowed with special permission of the Commissioner
clause_text: Incase of reserved sites which are under acquisition, the repairs may be allowed with special permission of the Commissioner. In both the cases, registered undertaking shall be insisted upon from the NOC holder/owner stating that no compensation will be claimed on account of repairs for the structure as and when the property is acquired, and grant of permission for repairs will not in any way affect the process of acquisition and shall not be used as a tool to impede the process of acquisition.
